name: Spright Blue
effectText: If you control a Level/Rank 2 monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Spright Blue" once per turn this way. If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Spright" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Spright Blue". You can only use this effect of "Spright Blue" once per turn.
